description.value:
Frequency once per day

You make a mighty jump, pushing against the air like the wings of a couatl. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}. If you High Jump, you automatically get a critical success. If you Long Jump, you can automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} the maximum horizontal distance you could normally travel plus an additional 5 feet. You also gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH] until the start of your next turn.
